de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl

Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl.Neuron

  • public class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a Neuron in a Neuronal Network.
    Author:
    Marcel Walden

    • Field Detail

      • incomingDendrites

        private java.util.ArrayList<Axon> incomingDendrites
        List all Denderites the Neuron is connected to. Needs to be filled when New

      • activationFunction

        private EActivationFunction activationFunction
        Activation Function used by the Neuron.

      • neuronType

        private ENeuronType neuronType
        Specification of the Neurons type.

      • myPerceptron

        private Perceptron myPerceptron
        Perceptron the Neuron lives in.

      • layer

        private int layer
        Layer number inside of the Perceptron.

      • activationState

        private boolean activationState
        Represents the Activation State of the Neuron. TRUE means the Neuron is activated, FALSE means it's not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Neuron

        public Neuron(EActivationFunction activationFunction,
      ENeuronType neuronType,
      Perceptron myPerceptron,
      int layer)
        Constructor to be used for creating new Neurons. Adds the new Neuron to the given Perceptrons Neuron-List for later usage.
        Parameters:
        activationFunction - The Activation Function used by the Neuron.
        neuronType - Specifies the Type of the Neuron (INPUT, OUTPUT, HIDDEN)
        myPerceptron - The Perceptron in which the Neuron "lives" in.
        layer - The Number of the Layer in which the Neuron lives inside of the Perceptron.

    • Method Detail

      • getActivationFunction

        public EActivationFunction getActivationFunction()
        Getter-Method for the Activation-Function used by the Neuron.
        Returns:
        the activationFunction

      • getNeuronType

        public ENeuronType getNeuronType()
        Getter Method for the Neuron Type.
        Returns:
        the neuronType

      • connectNewDendrite

        public java.lang.Boolean connectNewDendrite(Axon toConnect)
        Inserts an Axon to the List of the Neurons incoming Dendrites.
        Parameters:
        toConnect - The Axon that should be connected to the Neuron
        Returns:
        TRUE when Axon was inserted, FALSE when Axon is already connected to the Neuron.

      • calculateOutput

        public double calculateOutput()
        Calculates the output of the Neuron by using the specified Activation Function
        Returns:
        Functionvalue of the Activation Function.

      • propagateMe

        public double propagateMe()
        Calculates the Propagation for this Neuron. Uses the sum over all Products between Axons Starting Point and the Axons Weight.
        Returns:
        Functionvalue of the Propagation of this Neuron
